qas.question: What contest shift the Cubs' Fortunes?

answers.text: NBC Saturday Game of the Week

qas.question: What had the contest between the Cubs and the St. Louis Cardinals been dubbed as?
How many game-tying home runs did Sandberg get against the Cardinals at the Sandber Game?

context: The shift in the Cubs' fortunes was characterized June 23 on the "<a0_0>NBC Saturday Game of the Week<a0_0/>" contest against the St. Louis Cardinals. it has since been dubbed simply "<a1_0>The Sandberg Game<a1_0/>." With the nation watching and Wrigley Field packed, Sandberg emerged as a superstar with not one, but <a2_0>two<a2_0/> game-tying home runs against Cardinals closer Bruce Sutter. With his shots in the 9th and 10th innings Wrigley Field erupted and Sandberg set the stage for a comeback win that cemented the Cubs as the team to beat in the East. No one would catch them, except the Padres in the playoffs.
